long_description: The sleek and compact Exped Mountain Lite 30 Pack is a versatile, lightweight top loader. Its trim design and excellent fit offer unrestricted movement and load control for fast-and-light adventures. Hipbelt padding can be removed when only a simple hip strap is required for climbing, biking or urban use. Variable-position hipbelt buckle can be centered or, depending on personal preference, worn left or right over the padded belt to prevent pressure on your abdomen. Thermo-formed back panel offers a comfortable fit and features durable snow- and water-shedding treatment. Slim pack body brings the center of gravity close to your body for load control when climbing, skiing or biking. Enjoy easy, 1-handed opening and closing of the lid with lightweight aluminum hook; key clip and small zippered lid pockets outside and inside. Bright-colored interior coating for excellent visibility of contents; hydration tube port and hook in the pack are compatible with most hydration reservoirs (sold separately). Top compression strap can be fed through the hydration port for added load control when the top lid is stowed inside. Side compression straps feature durable and light aluminum hooks. Front daisy chain and 2 stowable ice tool/trekking pole loops create numerous attachment options. Double layered base for durability; pack stands upright on flat base. The Exped Mountain Lite 30 Pack features rip-and-stick tabs on all adjustable straps to keep strap ends from flapping in the wind.
short_description: The sleek and compact Exped Mountain Lite 30 Pack is a versatile, lightweight top loader. Its trim design and excellent fit offer unrestricted movement and load control for fast-and-light adventures.
